scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm run-script build && cd ..
scripts.deploy: cp -a client/build/. public/ && mv public/index.html public/react.html
scripts.sitemap: cd client && npm run-script sitemap && cp -a public/sitemap.xml ../public/sitemap.xml && cd ..
scripts.postinstall: npm run-script build && npm run-script deploy && npm run-script sitemap && echo 'Client built!'
